about_the_game:
Additional content for SWORD ART ONLINE Last Recollection, including a new scenario and new costumes!

Includes:
• Ritual of Bonds Vol. 2 scenario contents for:
－Alice
－Eugeo
－Leafa
－Yuuki
－Rain
－Seven
－Kureha
－Zeliska
－Medina
• New dungeon
• New costume for the above characters

While investigating a dungeon that suddenly appeared under the Obsidia Castle Town, Kirito and his friends face the Ritual of Bonds challenge, which can only be performed in pairs.

Now, Kirito and his trusted partner will have to prove their bond to pass the ritual of bonds!

*Scenarios for characters that leave the party temporarily can be accessed when the character returns.
*SWORD ART ONLINE Last Recollection - Ritual of Bonds Vol. 2 can be played without purchasing SWORD ART ONLINE Last Recollection - Ritual of Bonds Vol. 1

Additional content for SWORD ART ONLINE Last Recollection, including a new scenario and new costumes!

Includes:

－Eugeo
－Leafa
－Yuuki

－Zeliska
－Medina
• New dungeon
• New costume for the above characters

While investigating a dungeon that suddenly appeared under the Obsidia Castle Town, Kirito and his friends face the Ritual of Bonds challenge, which can only be performed in pairs.

Now, Kirito and his trusted partner will have to prove their bond to pass the ritual of bonds!

*Scenarios for characters that leave the party temporarily can be accessed when the character returns.
*SWORD ART ONLINE Last Recollection - Ritual of Bonds Vol. 2 can be played without purchasing SWORD ART ONLINE Last Recollection - Ritual of Bonds Vol. 1
